ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED( pricingAssignmentComplete__c) && ((TEXT(status__c) <> 'Pricing Assignment') || ( (RecordType.Name == 'Raw - Submitted' || RecordType.Name == 'Concore - Submitted') && (IsBlank(priceUnit__c) || IsBlank(moq__c) || IsBlank(Text(moqUom__c)) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to set pricing, MOQ and price must be entered and MTO request must be in 'Pricing Assignment' status.
